node.title: Man due in court on firearms-related charges after Ōtara incident.
node.description: A 40-year-old man is to appear in court on firearms charges after an incident in Ōtara.
node.content:
["A 40-year-old man has been charged with firearms offences after an incident in South Auckland.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Claire Eastham-Farrelly\n
", "Police were called shortly after 7pm on Wednesday a report of a man in possession of a firearm at an \u014ctara address.", "He was arrested at 10pm.", "No-one was reported to be injured.", "The man was due to appear in the Manukau District Court on Thursday."]
